item.title: Grand jury rejects new mortgage fraud indictment against New York Attorney General Letitia James
item.description: Thursday's failed indictment against James is the latest setback for the Justice Department in its bid to prosecute the frequent political target of the Republican president.

item.title: Supreme Court lets Texas use gerrymandered map that could give GOP 5 more House seats
item.description: The Supreme Court has cleared the way for a Texas congressional map that may help the GOP win five more U.S. House seats in the 2026 midterms. A lower court found the map is likely unconstitutional.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: State Department to deny visas to fact checkers and others, citing 'censorship'
item.description: The order is focused on applicants for H-1B visas, which are frequently used by tech companies and is part of a campaign by the Trump administration against online content moderation.

item.title: Libraries and museums get federal funding back after Trump cuts
item.description: Earlier this year, the Trump administration gutted the Institute of Museum and Library Services, leading to canceled federal grants. Now, after a court order, those grants are being reinstated.

item.title: CDC advisers delay planned vote on hepatitis B vaccine for infants
item.description: After a contentious discussion, the vaccine advisory group pushed the vote to Friday to give members time to study the language of proposed changes longstanding policy on the shots.

item.title: DOJ orders prison inspectors to stop considering LGBTQ safety standards
item.description: A memo obtained by NPR shows the Justice Department is telling inspectors to stop evaluating prisons using standards designed to protect trans and other LGBTQ community members from sexual violence.

item.title: How old is your music taste? Spotify will tell you, though you may not like it
item.description: Spotify Wrapped is bluntly telling users their "listening age," which in many cases is several decades older or younger than their actual age. It's a calculated strategy.
